item.jinxed.sacrificial_book.desc: ยง8Whoever made this knew what they were doing...
item.jinxed.memoir.desc: This book has been here for years...
item.jinxed.voodoo_doll.desc: Right click to jinx a mob.
item.jinxed.voodoo_doll.desc2: Shift + Right click while holding an item in your off-hand to Puppatear.
item.jinxed.voodoo_doll_pricked.desc: Right click after you take damage to harm the Jinxed mob.
item.jinxed.voodoo_doll_pricked.desc2: Use this too much and it might burn.
item.jinxed.voodoo_doll_burnt.desc2: Don't worry, You can still use it to smelt things.
